pageContext.public_note: Enrollment begins June 1st. For more info, or to be put automatically contacted when registration begins, please contact Michael Luong at Michael@play-well.org, or call (424) 672-5496.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: The Force Awakens in this introductory engineering course for young Jedi!  Explore engineering principles by designing and building projects using LEGO® materials such as X-Wings, R2 Units, Energy Catapults, Defense Turrets, and Settlements from a galaxy far, far away. Create motorized and architectural projects with imagination and engineering to defeat the Empire!
pageContext.phone_registration_description: To enroll via phone, please call (310) 326-0140
pageContext.action_url_comment: Search "LEGO."  To enroll in person, please visit 24428 Eshelman Ave.
